attributes.action: withdraw completely from the European Union, due to their failure to give the U.K. full support in attaining the release of our Kidnapped Service Personel by Iran.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Member Countries of the European Union have failed to give Great Britain full Backing to Attain the release of our Service personel who have been kidnapped by Iran.  If they cannot show 'Solidarity' with G.B. at such a time, can we really expect them to have our interests at heart when considering other problems.  It is time to call it a day on the European Union.

rejection.details: This is very similar to an existing petition: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/europewithdrawal/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
